title: Not Showing rank, help please
body:
So I finished my ten placements today and I have not actually been given a rank, it doesn't even show how many games I have played solo ranked, just a blank transparent symbol showing nothing, and yes I am 100% certain I have finished played all 10 games

One of my games was a leave (had an appointment re-scheduled) could this be relevant to the problem? Cheers

replies.body: Sometimes the league-stats server is slow to update. Have you tried loading it again since?
